Class MeterReadingService

java.lang.Object
com.kf7014.electricityprovidermicroservice.service.MeterReadingService
@Service public class MeterReadingService extends Object
Service class for managing meter readings in the Electricity Provider Microservice.

This service provides methods to save meter readings, retrieve readings based on various criteria, and obtain the latest reading for a specific meter.

Since:
2024-11-27
Version:
1.0
Author:
Muhammad Naqvi

  • Constructor Details

    • MeterReadingService

      public MeterReadingService(MeterReadingRepository repository)
      Constructs a new MeterReadingService with the specified repository.
      Parameters:
      repository - the MeterReadingRepository used for data access operations

  • Method Details

    • saveMeterReading

      public void saveMeterReading(MeterReading meterReading)
      Saves a meter reading to the repository.

      This method persists a MeterReading object representing a meter's reading. It is typically used for automated or smart meter readings.

      Parameters:
      meterReading - the MeterReading to be saved

    • saveManualMeterReading

      public void saveManualMeterReading(MeterReading meterReading)
      Saves a manual meter reading to the repository.

      This method persists a MeterReading object representing a manually submitted meter reading. Additional logic specific to manual readings can be implemented within this method.

      Parameters:
      meterReading - the MeterReading to be saved manually

    • getAllMeterReadingsSince

      public List<MeterReading> getAllMeterReadingsSince(Instant since)
      Retrieves all meter readings recorded since a specified timestamp.

      This method fetches a list of MeterReading objects that have a timestamp later than the provided since parameter.

      Parameters:
      since - the Instant representing the starting point in time from which readings are retrieved
      Returns:
      a List of MeterReading objects recorded after the specified timestamp

    • getMeterReadingsByMeterIdSince

      public List<MeterReading> getMeterReadingsByMeterIdSince(String meterId, Instant since)
      Retrieves meter readings for a specific meter ID recorded since a specified timestamp.

      This method fetches a list of MeterReading objects associated with the given meterId and have a timestamp later than the provided since parameter.

      Parameters:
      meterId - the unique identifier of the meter for which readings are to be retrieved
      since - the Instant representing the starting point in time from which readings are retrieved
      Returns:
      a List of MeterReading objects for the specified meter ID recorded after the specified timestamp

    • getLatestMeterReadingByMeterId

      public MeterReading getLatestMeterReadingByMeterId(String meterId)
      Retrieves the latest meter reading for a specific meter ID.

      This method fetches the most recent MeterReading object associated with the given meterId. If no readings are found for the specified meter ID, null is returned.

      Parameters:
      meterId - the unique identifier of the meter for which the latest reading is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the latest MeterReading object for the specified meter ID, or null if none found
